Question: This person and his brothers lingered in jail for six weeks before busy King Ferdinand ordered their release.
Hints: This person was received by the native cacique Guacanagari, who gave him permission to leave some of his men behind.
This person's name was given to the federal capital of the United States (District of Columbia), the capital cities of two U.S.
"this person's claim to fame isn't that he got there first," explains historian Martin Dugard, "it's that he stayed.".
